snippet.title: Super Mario Bros.: The Cookie of Destiny Trailer 1
snippet.description:
I think it'll interest all of my fans out there (all 5 of you ^_^;) that I'm working on a new fangame! It'll take on the Yoshi's Cookie spriting style and be about Yoshi, Luigi, and Mario going on a wild adventure to collect all 4 pieces of a certain cookie before Bowser does. It'll have a great emphasis on story conveyed through cutscenes, and the gameplay will try to be simplistic but fun!

Anyhow, enjoy this little preview I've whipped up for you guys!

Also, go here to learn more about the game:
http://forums.mfgg.net/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=12394
